      • getAllEvents

        public java.util.ArrayList<Events> getAllEvents()
        Generates the list of all events by calling loadAll() and returns that list
        Returns:
        The list of events in TABLE_EVENTS_MASTER.

      • loadAll

        public void loadAll()
        Loads the list of all events found in TABLE_EVENTS_MASTER. Adds them to the list object listAllEvents.

      • loadMonth

        public void loadMonth(int monthNo)
        Loads the events associated with the passed month value.
        Parameters:
        monthNo - The number of the current displayed month so that the database can load them all.

      • insertEvent

        public void insertEvent(java.lang.String mTitle,
                        java.lang.String mLocation,
                        java.lang.String mDesc,
                        java.lang.String mURL,
                        java.lang.String mDay,
                        java.lang.String mMonth,
                        java.lang.String mYear,
                        java.lang.String mHour,
                        java.lang.String mMinute)
        Inserts an event into TABLE_EVENTS_MASTER based on the passed values.
        Parameters:
        mTitle - Title of the event to be inserted.
        mLocation - Location of the event to be inserted.
        mDesc - Description of the event to be inserted.
        mURL - URL of the event to be inserted.
        mDay - Day of the event to be inserted.
        mMonth - Month of the event to be inserted.
        mYear - Year of the event to be inserted.
        mHour - Hour of the event to be inserted.
        mMinute - Minute of the event to be inserted.
